text.section: In this section, "person" has the meaning stated in § 21-322 of the Health - General Article.

The limitation on liability provided for in subsection (c) of this section does not apply to any person who:
Donates food to a nonprofit corporation, organization, or association that sells or offers for sale any donated food;
Prepares donated food for use or distribution by a nonprofit corporation, organization, or association that sells or offers for sale any donated food; or
Serves donated food distributed by a nonprofit corporation, organization, or association that sells or offers for sale any donated food.
